text: Live Earth was a series of concerts held on July 7, 2007. They were organized by Al Gore, who used to be the vice president. Inspired by Live Aid and Live 8, Live Earth was held to raise awareness about global warming. It was held in cities on every continent in the world, even Antarctica, and stars like Madonna and the Foo Fighters came out to help. ==Locations== Africa Africa Africa Coca Cola Dome Randburg near Johannesburg North America North America North America Giants Stadium East Rutherford near New York City National Mall Washington, D.C.
